id.description: The globally unique identifier of the service. Reverse domain name notation is used as id.

organization.description: The information of the organization, which provides DRS API.

contactUrl.description: The contact url of the organization.

documentationUrl.description: The url of supporting document for the service.

createdAt.description: The creation date of the service.

updatedAt.description: The creation date of the service.

environment.description: The environment of the service in which its up and running.
